title: Aditya Birla Capital seeks to double customer base through new digital app
description: Aditya Birla Capital Ltd (ABCL), a non-banking finance company of the $65 billion cement to fashion group, plans to double its customer base in three years through a new digital application. The application will allow the company to lend, sell insurance, and offer payment solutions to customers, doubling its current 35 million.
